de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.application

Class CoapClientApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniluebeck.itm.spitfire.nCoap.application.CoapClientApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponseCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCoapClientApplication

    public abstract class CoapClientApplication
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResponseCallback
    This is the abstract class to be extended by a CoAP client. By writeCoapRequest it provides an easy-to-use method to write CoAP requests to a server.
    Author:
    Oliver Kleine

      void writeCoapRequest(CoapRequest coapRequest)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoapClientApplication

        public CoapClientApplication()

    • Method Detail

      • writeCoapRequest

        public final void writeCoapRequest(CoapRequest coapRequest)
        This method should be used by extending client implementation to send a CoAP request to a remote recipient. All necessary information to send the message (like the recipient IP address or port) is automatically extracted from the given CoapRequest object.
        Parameters:
        coapRequest - The CoapRequest object to be sent
